pages.text: The parts required for rocketry are all made out of duraluminum alloy, made in the Electric arc furnace. For an arc furnace to produce 1 bar of duraluminum alloy, it requires 384000 units of flux, so youâ€™ll need an adequate supply of power for any large amount of duraluminum.
Duraluminum is used to create Machine Structures for starship construction.
